text: Jo a loko modhum pheravi le, to ame tamane te lokona niriksaka banavine nathi mokalya, tamari javabadari to phakta adesa pahoncadi devani che, ame jyare pana manusyane potani krpano svada cakhadi'e chi'e, to te tena para itarava lage che ane jo temana para temana karyona karane ko'i musibata pahonce che, to kharekhara manusya ghano ja krtadhni che
